thread.title: Becky Gosselin

author: Becky Gosselin
title: Becky Gosselin
text: I really like the products that I've received from this company. I enjoy looking through the page every month and I feel they make it easy to skip a month if you wish to skip. The only thing that i wish was that you could flag items for later or keep a "wish list". If something is sold out now I would love to be able to "follow" it so i would know when it is back in stock or a new color comes out.
